com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core

Class EngineView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.GameView
      • com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.EngineView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameManager

    public class EngineView
extends GameView
    A view which is not dependend on the currently active game. Singleton.
    Since:
    1.2.26

      • init

        public void init(Controller controller,
                 GameView oldView)
        Description copied from class: GameView
        Loades some files and set up everything. This should be done after creating and linking the view. After this has been inactive use GameView.onEnter()
        Overrides:
        init in class GameView
        Parameters:
        controller - The data sources used for the view. Can be null but should not.
        oldView - The view used before. Can be null.
        See Also:
        GameView.onEnter()

        Description copied from class: GameView
        Updates every camera and everything else which must be updated.
        Overrides:
        update in class GameView
        Parameters:
        dt - time since last update in ms.

        public void focusInputProcessor(com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor processor)

        Since:
